flavorText.text:
かなしみの　くるしさと　よろこびの
とうとさを　ひとびとに　おしえた。
かんじょうのかみ　と　よばれている。

みずうみの　そこで　ねむっているが
たましいが　ぬけだして　すいめんを
とびまわると　いわれている。

かなしみの　くるしさと　よろこびの
とうとさを　ひとびとに　おしえた。
かんじょうのかみ　と　よばれている。

みずうみの　そこで　ねむっているが
たましいが　ぬけだして　すいめんを
とびまわると　いわれている。

슬픔의 괴로움과 즐거움의 소중함을
사람들에게 가르쳐 주었다.
감정의 신이라 불리고 있다.

호수의 밑바닥에서 잠자고 있지만
영혼이 빠져나가서 수면을
날아다닌다고 전해진다.

슬픔의 괴로움과 즐거움의 소중함을
사람들에게 가르쳐 주었다.
감정의 신이라 불리고 있다.

호수의 밑바닥에서 잠자고 있지만
영혼이 빠져나가서 수면을
날아다닌다고 전해진다.

Quand il prit son envol, les hommes
apprirent à ressentir la joie et la
peine. L’émotion était née.

Quand il prit son envol, les hommes
apprirent à ressentir la joie et la
peine. L’émotion était née.

On l’appelle « être de l’émotion ». Il enseigne aux
hommes la beauté de la tristesse, la douleur et la
joie.

Il dort au fond d’un lac. On dit que son esprit
abandonne son corps pour voler à sa surface.

On l’appelle « être de l’émotion ». Il enseigne aux hommes
la beauté de la tristesse, la douleur et la joie.

Il dort au fond d’un lac. On dit que son esprit abandonne
son corps pour voler à sa surface.

„Das fühlende Wesen“. Es lehrt die Menschen
die Ideale von Trauer, Schmerz und Freude.

Es schläft auf dem Grund eines Sees. Man sagt, sein
Geist verlasse den Körper und fliege über den See.

„Das fühlende Wesen“. Es lehrt die Menschen die Ideale von
Trauer, Schmerz und Freude.

Es schläft auf dem Grund eines Sees. Man sagt, sein Geist
verlasse den Körper und fliege über den See.

Se le conoce como el Ser de la Emoción. Enseñó a los
humanos la nobleza del dolor y la alegría.

Duerme en el fondo de un lago. Se dice que su
espíritu deja el cuerpo para volar sobre el agua.

Se le conoce como el Ser de la Emoción. Enseñó a los
humanos la nobleza del dolor y la alegría.

Duerme en el fondo de un lago. Se dice que su espíritu deja
el cuerpo para volar sobre el agua.

Detto “Essere delle emozioni”. Ha insegnato agli
uomini la nobiltà di tristezza, gioia e dolore.

Dorme sul fondo di un lago. Si dice che il suo spirito
abbandoni il corpo per volare in superficie.

Detto “Essere delle emozioni”. Ha insegnato agli uomini
la nobiltà di tristezza, gioia e dolore.

Dorme sul fondo di un lago. Si dice che il suo spirito
abbandoni il corpo per volare in superficie.

Known as “The Being of Emotion.”
It taught humans the nobility of
sorrow, pain, and joy.

It sleeps at the bottom of a lake.
Its spirit is said to leave its body
to fly on the lake’s surface.

When MESPRIT flew, people learned
the joy and sadness of living.
It was the birth of emotions.

This Pokémon is said to have endowed
the human heart with emotions, such as
sorrow and joy.

This Pokémon is said to have endowed
the human heart with emotions, such as
sorrow and joy.

When Mesprit flew, people learned
the joy and sadness of living.
It was the birth of emotions.

When Mesprit flew, people learned
the joy and sadness of living.
It was the birth of emotions.

When Mesprit flew, people learned
the joy and sadness of living.
It was the birth of emotions.

When Mesprit flew, people learned
the joy and sadness of living.
It was the birth of emotions.

Known as “The Being of Emotion.” It taught
humans the nobility of sorrow, pain, and joy.

It sleeps at the bottom of a lake. Its spirit is said to
leave its body to fly on the lake’s surface.

Known as “The Being of Emotion.” It taught
humans the nobility of sorrow, pain, and joy.

It sleeps at the bottom of a lake. Its spirit is said to
leave its body to fly on the lake’s surface.

Known as the Being of Emotion. In legend, this Pokémon was
feared, as any who showed disrespect would have their
emotions thrown into disarray.
